details: As your local, total home comfort services provider, Petro provides professional, reliable plumbing service and repairs, including hot water heaters, drain cleaning, bathroom and kitchen upgrades, and water filtration systems.

Faucets typically have a lifespan of 10 years before parts start to fail, so be sure to note the date of existing faucets and repairs in a home repair book so you know when it's time for a fix. Note that ceramic disc faucets typically come with a lifetime guarantee from manufacturers because they are so durable and rarely need repairs.

Wastewater is water that has been used and must be treated before it is released into another body of water, so that it does not cause further pollution of water sources. Wastewater comes from a variety of sources. Everything that you flush down your toilet or rinse down the drain is wastewater. Rainwater and runoff, along with various pollutants, go down street gutters and eventually end up at a wastewater treatment facility.

Combining imagination and innovation, Rosa has transformed ceramics into aesthetic pieces of bathroom furniture. With trendy and original designs, Rosa Sanitaryware is not only visually pleasing but also carries comfort and convenience. With state-of-the-art technology and top quality materials, Rosa brings you magnificent washbasins and water closets which add personality to your home and business space.

Manufactured with impeccable quality and international standards, Rosa Sanitaryware is now exported abroad, especially to the countries of the Middle-east and Europe. With the promise of long-lasting germ-free glaze even in the unseen areas, Rosa is the ideal innovative sanitaryware solution which will add a hint of modern lifestyle to your life.

The latest addition to the Rosa Sanitaryware is the anti-bacterial technology which will keep you and your loved ones safe from harmful germs and microbes. The special anti-bacterial glaze of Rosa Sanitaryware contains Silver-ion technology that prohibits germs to proliferate and ensures better hygiene for your bathroom accessories.
